channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Waterloo Road
channel.desc: Schuey and Agnes cause uproar when they rebel against Stella's new rules. New teacher Darius Donovan arrives and shakes up the staffroom, while Jack Rimmer returns to tackle the troubles of a new generation on his first day as school counsellor. Cat and Izzy lock horns over the school's new addition, and Stella is distracted as she struggles to integrate her estranged grandkids at the school.
